Description.Name: E... I... E... I... OH, Neural Implants here we go
Description.Details: A knock sounds on your office door and you push a button on your desk to open the door. Yang strides in with a datapad, "Boss, remember awhile back you asked me to look into any ways we can improve MechWarrior performance? Well, I was looking through one of the back issues of TechSpecs, and there was an article about [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreEnhancedImagingDisplay],Enhanced Imaging Displays]]." You lean back in your chair and motion Yang to have a seat, "Refresh my memory again, how will this help us? Don't we already have mechs with these displays?" Yang sits down, "So Boss, the displays by themselves are great. BUT, when paired with a MechWarrior that has [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreNeuralImplant],Enhanced Imaging Neural Implants]], we could couple them with [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreEnhancedImaging],Enhanced Imaging]] displays in the cockpit to greatly enhance their performance." You lean forward, arms on crossed on your desk, "And the downsides? There are always downsides..." Yang sighs, "Well, yeah Boss. It's not without danger. The first step is having the chosen MechWarrior undergo the implant surgery. Provided they survive that, then we have a few weeks of training in the simulators. After that, they should be good to go in the field." You think about it for a few minutes in silence, "So, nothing else to worry about? And how risky is the surgery?" Yang looks at his datapad, "The article states that most patients come through with no issues and can be in the field in about a month. Worst case, of course is something goes wrong and they die during the procedure, but that apparently is extremely rare, like 1% or something. The only other thing the article mentions is the combat time for the MechWarrior is reduced." Your look turns to concern, "Reduced? What does Reduced mean?" Yang continues, "Let me see... it says here, and I quote: 'EI inflicts serious side effects on the user, including possible mental instability, nerve damage and death.'" You ponder all this information before speaking, "So the only ethical way to use this system is with volunteers then. Yang, get with Medical and have any volunteers checked out to see if they are suitable candidates." Yang hands over the datapad, "Already ahead of you on that Boss. Here are the first three volunteers: [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] You just need to sign that form on the screen and we can proceed from there."

Description.Name: All Systems Go
Description.Details: You place a tick next to [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s name on the datapad and scribble your signature. Handing the pad to Yang as you stand up, "Ok, lets get [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] to the MedBay and confirm {TGT_MW.SUBJ} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:still want|Default:still wants} to do this. Yang jumps up and heads off to the barracks as you proceed to the MedBay to speak to the Argo's surgeon. You arrive to find the surgeon inspecting the Neural Implant matrix. They look up when you arrive, "Hello, Commander. [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] is being prepped for surgery as we speak." You nod, "You feel comfortable performing this procedure?" The surgeon nods back, "I do Commander. I have done similar types of surgeries in my past before I hired on with your company." You turn to exit the room, "Very well, let me know how the procedure goes." :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Hours later, Yang finds you in the lounge, "Boss, I just wanted to tell you that everything seems to have gone fine with [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s implants. {TGT_MW.Subj_C} should be up and moving in the next couple of days and by the end of the month should have enough simpod training to go out into the field." You smile, and raise your glass, "Good news indeed! Keep me posted Yang."

Description.Name: Minor Complications
Description.Details: You place a tick next to [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s name on the datapad and scribble your signature. Handing the pad to Yang as you stand up, "Ok, lets get [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] to the MedBay and confirm {TGT_MW.SUBJ} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:still want|Default:still wants} to do this. Yang jumps up and heads off to the barracks as you proceed to the MedBay to speak to the Argo's surgeon. You arrive to find the surgeon inspecting the Neural Implant matrix. They look up when you arrive, "Hello, Commander. [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] is being prepped for surgery as we speak." You nod, "You feel comfortable performing this procedure?" The surgeon nods back, "I do Commander. I have done similar types of surgeries in my past before I hired on with your company." You turn to exit the room, "Very well, let me know how the procedure goes." :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Hours later, Yang finds you in the lounge, "Boss, I just wanted to tell you that there were minor complications with [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s implants. {TGT_MW.Subj_C} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:are|Default:is} fine and should be up and moving in the next couple of weeks and in a month or two should have enough simpod training to go out into the field. The extra time healing and training will set us back double the initial costs." You smile, and raise your glass, "The cost is irrelevant, I am just glad they pulled through. Keep me posted Yang."

Description.Name: Near Death Experience
Description.Details: You place a tick next to [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s name on the datapad and scribble your signature. Handing the pad to Yang as you stand up, "Ok, lets get [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] to the MedBay and confirm {TGT_MW.SUBJ} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:still want|Default:still wants} to do this. Yang jumps up and heads off to the barracks as you proceed to the MedBay to speak to the Argo's surgeon. You arrive to find the surgeon inspecting the Neural Implant matrix. They look up when you arrive, "Hello, Commander. [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] is being prepped for surgery as we speak." You nod, "You feel comfortable performing this procedure?" The surgeon nods back, "I do Commander. I have done similar types of surgeries in my past before I hired on with your company." You turn to exit the room, "Very well, let me know how the procedure goes." :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Hours later, Yang finds you in the lounge, "Boss, I just wanted to tell you that there were serious complications with [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s implants. {TGT_MW.Subj_C} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:are|Default:is} fine but it will take extended rehab and simpod training before they are ready to get back into the field. The extra time healing and training will set us back nearly 4x the initial costs." You smile, and raise your glass, "The cost is irrelevant, I am just glad they pulled through. Keep me posted Yang."

Description.Name: Sorry for your loss
Description.Details: You place a tick next to [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s name on the datapad and scribble your signature. Handing the pad to Yang as you stand up, "Ok, lets get [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] to the MedBay and confirm {TGT_MW.SUBJ} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:still want|Default:still wants} to do this. Yang jumps up and heads off to the barracks as you proceed to the MedBay to speak to the Argo's surgeon. You arrive to find the surgeon inspecting the Neural Implant matrix. They look up when you arrive, "Hello, Commander. [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] is being prepped for surgery as we speak." You nod, "You feel comfortable performing this procedure?" The surgeon nods back, "I do Commander. I have done similar types of surgeries in my past before I hired on with your company." You turn to exit the room, "Very well, let me know how the procedure goes." :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Hours later, Yang finds you in the lounge, "Boss, umm, well, we lost [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]. You lean forward in your chair, head in hands, staring at the floor, "How? What happened." Yang's shoulders slump, "Apparently [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] had a reaction to the implants. The doc said..." You look up, anger on your face, "What the hell?! I thought they did a full medical workup on [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]?" Yang sits down, "They did. But [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s condition was one that in 99% of these types of surgeries is never an issue. This time, it was." You fall back into the chair and down the whiskey in your glass, "Drop off the reports to my office and I will get them signed off and filed and notify [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s kin."

additionalValues: killed during a medical bio-enhancement procedure

Description.Name: None of these pilots are suitable
Abort! Abort!
Description.Details:
You look over the names and records of the three volunteers.  You thumb back through their files numerous times, before letting out a long sigh and closed the datapad.

You hand the pad back to Yang, "Thanks Yang, but I do not think any of those three pilots understand the risks involved here.  See if there are any other volunteers.  We do not need to rush into this blindly."

Yang takes the datapad, "As you wish, Boss."
